message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $110?
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, so I can do $105. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! However, I still need to make a profit, so I can do $98. That's my final offer, take it or leave it.
I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $92. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob! However, I'm willing to make one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I can do $97. That's my absolute final offer.
I understand you're willing to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
